column4: guys anyone , how can i turn off beep sound from system in 12.04 ?
I selected the 'main server' from 'Update manager', still the same error
please pastebin the error after you have selected main server
I have joined the current company few days back and they have let me install Ubuntu, but I think there are some ports blocked, but I am not sure if this the port problem
I run this command sudo rm /var/lib/apt/lists/* -vf and then sudo apt-get update , still the same error
there is the full traceback http://dpaste.com/833642/
they have provided me proxy server detials, will that help ?
that doesn't look like a network access error
